apiChineseName: UD效果外投投放监测链接生成
description: UD效果外投投放监测链接生成

labels.tips: 不需要用户授权，就能获取到数据

name: alibaba.taobao.ud.smart.monitor.url.create

publicParams.description: 用户登录授权成功后，TOP颁发给应用的授权信息，详细介绍请点击这里。当此API的标签上注明：“需要授权”，则此参数必传；“不需要授权”，则此参数不需要传；“可选授权”，则此参数为可选
publicParams.name: session

publicParams.description: 时间戳，格式为yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss，时区为GMT+8，例如：2015-01-01 12:00:00。淘宝API服务端允许客户端请求最大时间误差为10分钟
publicParams.name: timestamp

publicParams.description: 签名的摘要算法，可选值为：hmac，md5，hmac-sha256。
publicParams.name: sign_method

publicParams.description: API输入参数签名结果，签名算法介绍请点击这里
publicParams.name: sign

publicParams.description: 响应格式。默认为xml格式，可选值：xml，json。
publicParams.name: format

publicParams.description: 是否采用精简JSON返回格式，仅当format=json时有效，默认值为：false
publicParams.name: simplify

publicResponseParams.description: 平台颁发的每次请求访问的唯一标识
publicResponseParams.name: request_id

publicResponseParams.description: 请求访问失败时返回的根节点
publicResponseParams.name: error_response

publicResponseParams.description: 请求失败返回的错误码
publicResponseParams.name: code

publicResponseParams.description: 请求失败返回的错误信息
publicResponseParams.name: msg

publicResponseParams.description: 请求失败返回的子错误码
publicResponseParams.name: sub_code

publicResponseParams.description: 请求失败返回的子错误信息
publicResponseParams.name: sub_msg

publicResponseParams.description: 请求成功返回的根节点，'***' 为API名称的下划线模式
publicResponseParams.name: ***_response

subParams.description: 落地页类型：1-商品详情页；2-自研页
subParams.name: page_type

subParams.description: 自研页的H5链接；若落地页类型为“自研页”，该项必填
subParams.name: cus_h5_url

subParams.description: 需要封装成唤端链接的原始https链接；若落地页类型为“自研页”，该项必填
subParams.name: cus_deep_link

subParams.description: 监测唯一id，首次创建不需要传，通过出参返回。修改监测落地页时必填
subParams.name: monitor_unique_id

subParams.description: 产品类型：1-udsmart 2-流量通Pro，不传默认为udsmart
subParams.name: prod_type

sdkDemos.name: JAVA
.NET

sdkDemos.descprition:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
import top.api

req=top.api.taobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateRequest(url,port)
req.set_app_info(top.appinfo(appkey,secret))

req.monitor_url_top_request_dto="数据结构示例JSON格式"
try:
	resp= req.getResponse()
	print(resp)
except Exception,e:
	print(e)
sdkDemos.name: Python
NodeJS
C/C++

sdkDemos.descprition:
from datetime import datetime
from topsdk.client import TopApiClient,TopException
from topsdk.defaultability.defaultability import Defaultability
from topsdk.defaultability.request.alibaba_taobao_ud_smart_monitor_url_create_request import *

if __name__ == '__main__':
    # create Client
    client = TopApiClient(appkey='<your-appkey>', app_sercet='<your-appsecret>', top_gateway_url='<top-gateway-url>',verify_ssl=False)
    ability = Defaultability(client=client)

    # create domain
    alibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateMonitorUrlTopRequestDTO = AlibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateMonitorUrlTopRequestDTO()
    alibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateMonitorUrlTopRequestDTO.item_id = 123
    alibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateMonitorUrlTopRequestDTO.page_type = 1
    alibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateMonitorUrlTopRequestDTO.cus_h5_url = 'https://'
    alibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateMonitorUrlTopRequestDTO.cus_deep_link = 'https://'
    alibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateMonitorUrlTopRequestDTO.channel_id = 1
    alibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateMonitorUrlTopRequestDTO.monitor_unique_id = 'xxxx'
    alibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateMonitorUrlTopRequestDTO.prod_type = 1

    # create request
    request = AlibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateRequest()
    request.monitor_url_top_request_dto = alibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateMonitorUrlTopRequestDTO
    try:
        response = ability.alibaba_taobao_ud_smart_monitor_url_create(request)
        print(response)
    except TopException as e:
        print(e)
sdkDemos.name: Python3
GO

sdkDemos.descprition:
<?php
require "../vendor/autoload.php";
use Topsdk\Topapi\TopApiClient;
use Topsdk\Topapi\Defaultability\Request\AlibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateRequest;
use Topsdk\Topapi\Defaultability\Defaultability;
use Topsdk\Topapi\Defaultability\Domain\AlibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateMonitorUrlTopRequestDTO;


// create Client
$client = new TopApiClient("<your-appkey>","<your-appsecret>","<top-gateway-url>");
$ability = new Defaultability($client);

// create domain
$alibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateMonitorUrlTopRequestDTO = new AlibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateMonitorUrlTopRequestDTO();
$alibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateMonitorUrlTopRequestDTO->setItemId(123);
$alibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateMonitorUrlTopRequestDTO->setPageType(1);
$alibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateMonitorUrlTopRequestDTO->setCusH5Url("https://");
$alibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateMonitorUrlTopRequestDTO->setCusDeepLink("https://");
$alibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateMonitorUrlTopRequestDTO->setChannelId(1);
$alibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateMonitorUrlTopRequestDTO->setMonitorUniqueId("xxxx");
$alibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateMonitorUrlTopRequestDTO->setProdType(1);

// create request
$request = new AlibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateRequest();
$request->setMonitorUrlTopRequestDto(alibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreateMonitorUrlTopRequestDTO);

$response = $ability->alibabaTaobaoUdSmartMonitorUrlCreate($request);
var_dump($response);
